update blog_article
ART_NAME = #{artName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ART_SHORT = #{artShort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where ART_ID = #{artId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
